summary: Ok, but does an animagi's fur always have the same colour as their natural hair? Or would it change if they would dye it another...
body:
Ok, but does an animagi’s fur always have the same colour as their natural hair? Or would it change if they would dye it another colour? I mean we know that rat wormtail was also missing fingers like the human wormtail. And I think I remember that mcgs cat form looked like it had glasses.

I mean on one hand it would be super cool to be a cat with green fur or a rainbow bird, but it would also be super inconvenient because you could not blend in as a ‘normal’ animal.

Does that mean an animagus would have to stop dyeing their hair? What about tattoos? Would they show up?

Does that mean an animagus would have to stop dyeing their hair? What about tattoos? Would they show up?

summary: Romantic Love and Crumple-Horned Snorkacks (Through the Years)
title: Romantic Love and Crumple-Horned Snorkacks (Through the Years)
body:
by Crimson_Square

Romantic Love does, in fact, seem less likely to exist than Crumple-Horned Snorkacks.

Words: 976, Chapters: 1/5, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Luna Lovegood, Ginny Weasley, Ron Weasley, Molly Weasley
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley (mentioned), Cho Chang/Cedric Diggory (mentioned)
  • Additional Tags: probably some more characters but I’ll add them along with new chapters, aromantic Luna Lovegood, probably autistic Luna Lovegood, it’s not central but it’s there I think

Read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NegDWu

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

blog.name: greasysnivellus
blog.title: The Ultimate Snape Blog
blog.description: Obsessed with dark stuff. Do NOT call me a teenager, I am a child. Stans Snape, studying at Hogwarts in their imagination, and refugee from basically everything. Mostly random post on Hogwarts and SNAPE, sometimes also post/ reblog unrelated stuff. Nice to meet you, sadly I don't fancy a name.

title: Always
body:
“But this is touching, Severus,” said Dumbledore seriously. “Have you grown to care for the boy, after all?”
“For him?” shouted Snape. “Expecto Patronum!”
From the tip of his wand burst the silver doe. She landed on the office floor, bounded once across the office, and soared out of the window. Dumbledore watched her fly away, and as her silvery glow faded he turned back to Snape, and his eyes were full of tears.
“After all this time?”
“Always,” said Snape.”

“After all this time?”
“Always,” said Snape.”

title: Muses
body: This blog is strictly for role play use only. i am not nor do i claim to be any of the face claims used as my characters. all storylines are original and belong to me, please do not steal or replicate any of them. i will write with anyone, but not as a love interest because i already have one of those. if you’d like to write with me, please message the corresponding character. thank you! xoxo

[RP-ERS & (unauthorized & non-crediting) REPOSTERS DONT INTERACT DONT FOLLOW I BLOCK] 
Check me out:
+ http://archiveofourown.org/users/AKnightOfAGoodKing
+ https://twitter.com/kappachyun?s=09

summary: Hey, I really wish I didn't have to do this, but I need to raise funds for a study abroad trip this year and tickets are...
body:
Hey, I really wish I didn’t have to do this, but I need to raise funds for a study abroad trip this year and tickets are expensive. ;__; So if you’d like to help, I’m doing fanfiction commissions. My rates are undetermined, so please chat me up if you’re willing to support for a fic or two, or just to support. You can check me out here of you want to see what I’m like before asking: https://archiveofourown.org/users/AKnightOfAGoodKing

I will not write smut, gore, rape, pedophila, etc. We will discuss this in private for further details.

Thank you. I really appreciate it.

Ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/aknightofagoodking

summary:
Draco: You are the most Gryffindor person I know. It's like you're Godric Gryffindor himself
Harry: The Sorting Hat wanted to...
body:
Draco: You are the most Gryffindor person I know. It's like you're Godric Gryffindor himself
Harry: The Sorting Hat wanted to put me in Slytherin
Draco *inner projection of his life at Hogwarts with Harry in Slytherin, the two of them being boyfriends since First Year and sappy as fuck*: You'd have died the first night
